Korean Drama.title: Fight for My Way
Korean Drama.summary: A story about four individuals—Dong Man, Ae Ra, Joo Man, and Sul Hee—pursuing their dreams despite societal expectations. Dong Man, a former taekwondo athlete, and Ae Ra, aspiring to be an announcer, navigate challenges in their personal and professional lives.

Korean Drama.title: Welcome to Waikiki
Korean Drama.summary: Three men—Dong-gu, Du-sik, and Jun-ki—run a guesthouse named Waikiki in Itaewon, facing comedic situations as they strive to make it successful while dealing with personal aspirations.

Korean Drama.title: Psychopath Diary
Korean Drama.summary: Yook Dong-sik, a timid office worker, witnesses a murder and loses his memory. Mistakenly believing he's the killer after finding the murderer's diary, he undergoes a transformation.

Korean Drama.title: Lawless Lawyer
Korean Drama.summary: Bong Sang-pil, a former gangster turned lawyer, uses his fists and legal loopholes to fight against corrupt authorities in the fictional city of Kisung.

Korean Drama.title: Vagabond
Korean Drama.summary: Cha Dal-gun, a stuntman, investigates a plane crash that killed his nephew, uncovering a web of corruption and conspiracies.

Korean Drama.title: School 2017
Korean Drama.summary: A high school drama focusing on students' struggles with academic pressure, societal expectations, and personal growth.

Korean Drama.title: The Uncanny Counter
Korean Drama.summary: So Mun, a high school student with a disability, joins a group called 'Counters' who hunt evil spirits escaping the afterlife.

Korean Drama.title: Start-Up
Korean Drama.summary: Set in South Korea's fictional Silicon Valley, Sandbox, the series follows young entrepreneurs navigating the world of start-ups.

Korean Drama.title: Busted! Season 3
Korean Drama.summary: A variety show where celebrity detectives solve fictional crimes, blending scripted and unscripted content.

Korean Drama.title: Hotel Del Luna
Korean Drama.summary: Jang Man-wol, the owner of a hotel for ghosts, is bound to the establishment due to a past sin. The story unfolds as she meets the new manager, Goo Chan-sung.

Korean Drama.title: Doona!
Korean Drama.summary: Lee Doo-na, a former K-pop idol, meets college student Lee Won-jun after moving into a shared house, leading to a romantic relationship.

Korean Drama.title: Twinkling Watermelon
Korean Drama.summary: A CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) boy with a talent for music travels back to 1995, forming a band with his father and experiencing youth anew.

Korean Drama.title: Hospital Playlist
Korean Drama.summary: Five doctors who have been friends since medical school navigate their careers and personal lives, sharing a love for music.

Korean Drama.title: When Life Gives You Tangerines
Korean Drama.summary: Set in Jeju Island from the 1960s to present, the series follows Ae-sun and Gwan-sik's enduring love story amidst societal changes.

Korean Drama.title: Crash Landing on You
Korean Drama.summary: Yoon Se-ri, a South Korean heiress, accidentally paraglides into North Korea and meets Ri Jeong-hyeok, a North Korean officer who hides and protects her.

Korean Drama.title: Itaewon Class
Korean Drama.summary: Park Sae-ro-yi opens a bar-restaurant in Itaewon after being expelled from school and imprisoned, seeking revenge against a powerful food conglomerate.

Korean Drama.title: What's Wrong with Secretary Kim
Korean Drama.summary: Lee Young-joon, a narcissistic vice-chairman, is thrown off when his highly capable secretary, Kim Mi-so, announces her resignation.

Anime.title: Death Parade
Anime.summary: A psychological thriller where deceased individuals are sent to a mysterious bar to play games that determine their fate in the afterlife.

Anime.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End
Anime.summary: An elven mage reflects on her past adventures and embarks on a new journey to understand human emotions and mortality.

Anime.title: Akudama Drive
Anime.summary: In a dystopian future, a group of criminals known as 'Akudama' are brought together for a high-stakes mission.

Anime.title: Summertime Rendering
Anime.summary: After returning to his hometown for a friend's funeral, a young man uncovers a series of mysterious events and time loops.

Anime.title: Heavenly Delusion
Anime.summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, two teenagers search for a place called 'Heaven' while facing various threats.

Anime.title: Demon Slayer
Anime.summary: A young boy becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister is turned into a demon.

Anime.title: Soul Eater
Anime.summary: Students at the Death Weapon Meister Academy train to collect souls and prevent the rise of evil beings.

Anime.title: Wistoria: Wand and Sword
Anime.summary: A boy with no magical talent strives to become a powerful mage through sheer determination and swordsmanship.

Anime.title: Seven Deadly Sins
Anime.summary: A group of knights known as the Seven Deadly Sins embark on a quest to save their kingdom from corruption.

Anime.title: Wind Breaker
Anime.summary: A delinquent high school student joins a group that protects their town while dealing with rival gangs.

American Shows.title: Family Guy
American Shows.summary: An animated sitcom following the misadventures of the Griffin family in the fictional city of Quahog.

American Shows.title: Rick and Morty
American Shows.summary: A sci-fi comedy series about a mad scientist and his good-hearted but fretful grandson on interdimensional adventures.

American Shows.title: Regular Show
American Shows.summary: Two best friends, a blue jay and a raccoon, work as groundskeepers at a park and often find themselves in surreal adventures.

American Shows.title: Danny Phantom
American Shows.summary: A teenage boy gains ghost powers and becomes a superhero, protecting his town from supernatural threats.

American Shows.title: Jimmy Neutron
American Shows.summary: A boy genius invents gadgets to solve problems, often leading to unintended and humorous consequences.

American Shows.title: Johnny Test
American Shows.summary: An adventurous boy with two genius sisters embarks on experiments that often lead to chaotic situations.

American Shows.title: Fairly Odd Parents
American Shows.summary: A young boy is granted fairy godparents who grant his wishes, leading to unexpected adventures.

American Shows.title: Adventure Time
American Shows.summary: A boy and his magical dog embark on surreal adventures in the post-apocalyptic Land of Ooo.

American Shows.title: iCarly
American Shows.summary: A teenager creates a popular web show with her friends, navigating fame and adolescence.

American Shows.title: Drake & Josh
American Shows.summary: Two teenage stepbrothers with contrasting personalities navigate high school and family life.
